0.title: Eden Space
0.query:
timeseries avg(dt.runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used), by: { dt.entity.process_group_instance }, 
filter:dt.entity.process_group_instance in [fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance | filter in(managementZones, $ManagementZone) | fields id]
| fieldsAdd runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.process_group_instance, "entity.name")
| sort runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used desc
| limit 20
